|802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = rock |defaultpass = rock |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Ubuntu, OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/15/2022 |estreldate = 04/2020 |estprice = 26 |upc = 4038816097545 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = USB (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8821CU; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 150/150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Radxa|List of SBCs}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3328 @1.3GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: eMMC module socket, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Wi-Fi/BT: [[Realtek]] RTL8821CU (BT 4.2) *Network: 1x 1GbE (LAN), 1x FE (WAN) ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/07/17/rock-pi-e-sbc-wifi-bluetooth-two-ethernet-ports-poe/ ''Rock Pi E SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/rock-pi-4c-variant-adds-mini-dp-while-rock-pi-e-offers-dual-lan/ ''Rock Pi E offers dual LAN'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2020/07/the-24-rock-pi-e-is-a-tiny-quad-core-computer-for-headless-applications.html ''Rock Pi E is a tiny quad-core computer'' on '''Liliputing'''] ===Models=== *[[Radxa Rock Pi E (D4W1P)]] • 512MB (DDR3), RTL8723DU (Wi-Fi 4/BT 4.2), PoE *[[Radxa Rock Pi E (D8W2)]] • 1GB (DDR3), RTL8821CU (Wi-Fi 5/BT 4.2), no PoE *[[Radxa Rock Pi E (D8W2P)]] • 1GB (DDR3), RTL8821CU (Wi-Fi 5/BT 4.2), PoE ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/radxa/radxa_rock_pi_e |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = rockchip |subtarget = armv8 |arch = aarch64_generic |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = PoE suported on 1Gbit port with optional hat
WLAN is optional along with BT 4.2
Optional DDR4 RAM: 512MB / 1GB / 2GB
optional eMMC: 4GB / 8GB / 16GB, up to 128GB }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== :;[[Radxa]] • [https://wiki.radxa.com/Home Radxa Wiki] *[[Radxa Rock Pi 3]] (A/C) • [[Rockchip]] RK3568 4x @2.0GHz *[[Radxa Rock Pi 4]] (A/B+/C/SE) • [[Rockchip]] RK3399 *[[Radxa Rock Pi 5]] (B) • [[Rockchip]] RK3588(s) Octa core :4x ARM (Cortex-A76) + 4x ARM (Cortex-A55) *[[Radxa Rock Pi E]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3328 ARM (Cortex-A53) *[[Radxa Rock Pi S]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3308 ARM (Cortex-A35) *[[Radxa Rock Pi N10]] • [[Rockchip]] RK3399Pro *[[Radxa Rock Pi X]] • [[Intel Atom]] Z8350 Quad core @1.44GHz [[Category:English Documentation]]
